class.name: BulletServerRelay
class.brief_description: Singleton object for communication between BulletServers and spawners.
class.description: Singleton object for communication between [BulletServer]s and spawners. Simply houses signals which can be used to send spawn messages to [BulletServer]s. This is used instead of directly attaching the signals from spawner to server so that servers can be added to and configured within a scene, without needing to keep track of node paths.

method.name: on_bullet_fired
method.description: Emits [code]bullet_spawn_requested[/code]. Connect spawners' individual bullet spawn request signals here.

method.name: on_volley_fired
method.description: Emits [code]volley_spawn_requested[/code]. Connect spawners' volley spawn request signals here.

signal.name: bullet_spawn_requested
signal.description: Signal to be passed to bullet spawners to request a single bullet spawn.

signal.description: Signal to be passed to bullet spawners to request a single bullet spawn.
